concept.definition: Candle or series of candles before strong move where institutions accumulated position
concept.why_important: Institutions often return to these zones to add more

bullish_order_block.description: Last bearish candle before strong rally
characteristics: Followed immediately by strong up move

bearish_order_block.description: Last bullish candle before strong decline
characteristics: Followed immediately by strong down move

entry_at_ob.setup: Price returns to order block zone

ob_with_liquidity_sweep.entry: After sweep into OB, reversal confirmed

validity_rules.valid_until: OB valid until price closes through it
validity_rules.retests: First retest strongest, each additional retest weakens
